title: Neisser Villa - Software Engineer
text:
I’m a backend engineer with a front-end superpower (React & Next.js, to be specific ). I code fluently in JavaScript & Node.js, and dabble in Go, Rust, & Python to keep my brain buzzing. My toolbox overflows with libraries like Express, NestJS, Sequelize, Mongoose, Jest, and more.
But that’s not all! Beyond the code, I’m comfortable navigating the infrastructure landscape. I leverage tools like Kafka for efficient data streaming, Sonarqube for maintaining code quality, and GitHub Actions for automated deployments. When it comes to the cloud, I’m proficient in AWS services like Lambda, EC2, S3, SQS, and SNS, using them to design and manage robust, scalable systems.
I’m on a mission to push the boundaries of what’s possible, constantly learning and adapting. If you’re building something ambitious and need a passionaten software engineer with a holistic view 🙌





Typescript - Javascript - NodeJs - ExpressJs - API REST - NestJs - Jest - React - NextJs - MongoDB - PostgreSQL - AWS Services - Docker - Sonarqube - GIT - Figma. - System Architecture - Technical Leadership



Python - C# - Rust - Golang - GraphQL - Angular - Redis - Firebase - GCP - Azure Services - Linux.







Back End Team Lead (1 year 6 months)

Conexis VMS - Streamlined Vendor Management System

Role: Tech Lead
Description: Conexis VMS, a user-centric vendor management system automating the procure-to-pay process for contingent non-employee contractors and vendors.
Responsibilities:

Led the technical team, overseeing the development process from conception to implementation.
Employed NestJS, PostgreSQL, and Next.js to ensure a cost-effective and user-friendly system.



Back End Developer (aug 2022 - mar 2023 (8 months))

Plan Notice - Communication Management for Retirement Plans:

Role: Backend Developer
Description: Developed Plan Notice, a platform enabling companies to effectively track and manage communications with retirement plan participants.
Responsibilities:

Utilized Node.js, Express, and MongoDB to build the backend logic for seamless data handling.
Integrated knack.com for enhanced user experience and interaction.

Responsibilities:

Ensured the successful implementation of a reliable and scalable notification mechanism.







Technical Lead

Backend development with Node.js, Express.js and Nest.js
Frontend development with React, Gatsby and Angular

Project planning
Assess and implement new plugins, frameworks, applications, and platforms for an optimal development workflow

Inferno Hub - Exclusive Content Sharing Platform

Role: Backend Developer
Description: Contributed to the development of Inferno Hub, a platform similar to OnlyFans, designed for Canada.
Responsibilities:

Developed backend functionalities using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.
Collaborated with frontend developers to ensure seamless integration of features.


Full-stack Developer

Backend development with Node.js, Express.js and Nest.js
Frontend development with React, Gatsby and Angular
Implementation and development with relational & non-relational databases
AWS & GCP cloud services implementation.
Assess and implement new plugins, frameworks, applications, and platforms for an optimal development workflow
Collaborate with external IT and Development teams to coordinate work and project releases
Dialogflow implementation for chatbot project

Project Experience: Estori - Latin American eCommerce Platform

Role: Fullstack Developer
Description: Played a key role in developing Estori, an innovative eCommerce platform for Latin American brands.
Responsibilities:

Utilized NestJS, ReactJS, Redux, MongoDB, and Redis to create a responsive and engaging shopping experience.
Contributed to both backend and frontend development, ensuring smooth platform functionality.


Project Experience: Se Heroe - Taxi Driver Admin Dashboard

Role: Fullstack Developer
Description: Developed an admin dashboard, Se Heroe, tailored for taxi drivers to manage their operations efficiently.
Responsibilities:

Implemented Node.js, Express.js, Angular 10, and Firebase for building a comprehensive management tool.
Ensured seamless integration with Firebase for authentication and real-time updates.
